title: Strathpeffer
name: Castle Leod
hours: Open to the public several times a year
content: Historic tower house, possibly dating from the 15th century. It is now the home of the Earl of Cromartie, Chief of Clan Mackenzie. It is the inspiration for Diana Gabaldon's 'Outlander' series of books. Also a variety of impressive trees in the castle grounds, including several Giant Sequoia and an ancient Spanish Chestnut.
